item.title: Changeset [1835]: Add $post_per_archive_page to override the number of posts to show for ...
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Add $post_per_archive_page to override the number of posts to show for an archive page. Turn off paging if $post_per_* are set to -1.

item.title: Changeset [1834]: Extract updated query vars back into global namespace.
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Extract updated query vars back into global namespace.

item.title: Ticket #413 (User profile not updated) created
item.dc:creator: midrangeman
item.description: I enter text in a users profile and click the "Update User" botton, but the text box comes back empty.

item.title: Ticket #412 (Editing posts causes custom field "enclosure" and pinging images) created
item.dc:creator: Beel
item.description: Don't know how else to describe it. If my post has some images in it and I happen to edit it. I get custom fields added like: enclosure: ​http://.../04.jpg 13854 image/jpeg, ​http://.../thumb-04.jpg 6101 image/jpeg and the images are listed under "already pinged"

item.title: Changeset [1833]: Eliminate double emails. Already sending email in wp_new_comment()
item.dc:creator: emc3
item.description: Eliminate double emails. Already sending email in wp_new_comment()

item.title: Changeset [1831]: Added links to developer's sites. Fixed bug in install: post2cat ...
item.dc:creator: donncha
item.description: Added links to developer's sites. Fixed bug in install: post2cat record for "first post" missing.

item.title: Changeset [1830]: Do not touch REQUEST_URI if it is already set by the server.
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Do not touch REQUEST_URI if it is already set by the server.

item.title: Ticket #411 (Notification emails (e.g., comment notification) sent in BASE64) updated
item.dc:creator: timeistight
item.description: I forgot to log in when I reported this.
